thread.title: Jose Mourinho admits Wayne Rooney could miss EFL Cup final despite returning to Manchester United training
thread.title_full: Jose Mourinho admits Wayne Rooney could miss EFL Cup final despite returning to Manchester United training

author: Liam Prenderville
title: Jose Mourinho admits Wayne Rooney could miss EFL Cup final despite returning to Manchester United training
text:
Sport Jose Mourinho admits Wayne Rooney could miss EFL Cup final after returning to Manchester United training Rooney was not deemed fit enough to be named in the squad for the Europa League second leg with St Etienne and Jose Mourinho has admitted he could miss out at Wembley Share Mourinho and Rooney during training (Photo: 2017 Getty Images) Share Get Manchester United FC updates directly to your inbox + Subscribe Could not subscribe, try again later Invalid Email 
Wayne Rooney could miss the EFL Cup final. 
The Manchester United captain returned to training on Tuesday after a muscular injury. 
But he was deemed not fit enough to be named in the squad for the Europa League second leg with St Etienne. 
And Mourinho has admitted his captain could now miss out on the Wembley showdown with Southampton. 
"I don't know. This morning was the first time he trained and didn't even train 100 per cent with the group," he said when asked if Rooney would play. The United skipper walks out onto the pitch (Photo: 2017 Getty Images) Rooney in action during training (Photo: REUTERS) 
"He was doing the warming up and the basic things after warming up but then when the training session was higher in intensity he was not training. 
"No chance for tomorrow, he is not here, he stayed back training, and let's see for the weekend," Mourinho said. 
The Red Devils take on Southampton looking to win the first piece of silverware of United's reign. poll loading Who will win the EFL Cup? 1000+ VOTES SO FAR
